pullRequest.title: Fix ValueTypeHelpers JDK15 Valhalla compilation failure
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes: #9287
Split ValueTypeHelpers class name into Full and Compressed
Move VM_ValueTypeHelpers::isSubstitutable from cpp to hpp
Tested in personal build - compilation failure no longer occurring.

beforeCommit.message:
Fix ValueTypeHelpers JDK15 Valhalla compilation failure

JDK15 Valhalla compilation failure was occurring in
Build_JDKnext_x86-64_linux_valhalla_Nightly.

Split ValueTypeHelpers class name into Full and Compressed
Move VM_ValueTypeHelpers::isSubstitutable from cpp to hpp

Signed-off-by: Sharon Wang <sharon-wang-cpsc@outlook.com>

nodes.bodyText: nitpick: the preprocessor checks should be shifted a tab to the left
